definition: to have luck with the ladies (idiom)
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Raj :Oh, we should have a plan in case one of us gets lucky.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我們得制定個計劃以防萬一我們中有誰走桃花運。
